title: BSOD in middle of the game . Help me :P
body: Im getting blue screen of death in the middle of the game only in League of Legends. I was playing Battlefield 4 for like 3-4 hours nonstop and no blue screen. or when im in web scrolling and stuff ... i get BSOD only when im in LoL game. Everytime i start playing LoL game starts and like in 10-20 mins i always get blue screen. sometimes when blue screen pops up it have buzzing sound. sometimes not. I think it's a hardware problem, so which one is it? so i can buy a new one. idk maybe its something else ... or maybe reinstall will help the problem? tell me what to do guys. help:)

replies.body: Of many technical issues, the blue screen of death is  maybe the most frustrating.  Sorry this is happening to you.  :(  Double check your air vents, you might be overheating!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) too, our tech team might be able to get more context and find some options for you.

Yup... i messaged riot games support they messaged me and they ignoring me for 3 days now... they didn't help me at all ... im getting BSOD 3 times in 1 game. so anyone help me? tell me why im getting bsod? ...
yea i already messaged support. hope they will help. but guys anyways what u think which hardware problem is it
